Package eu.tivian.musico.utility

Various utility classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ItemClickListener<T>
    Custom View.OnClickListener for any view lacking this feature.
    SimpleTextWatcher
    A simplified version of TextWatcher which requires only TextWatcher.onTextChanged(CharSequence, int, int, int) implementation.
    SuccessListener<R>
    Simplified version of RequestListener to be used for listening for successful loading of a resource.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DateWatcher
    TextWatcher which is tailored to handle validation of date text input.
    IconComparator
    Custom comparator for Last.fm icons.
    PeriodicTask
    Task which should run periodically.
    SizeComparator
    Compares the two Size objects.
    SuggestionShower
    Helper class which makes autosuggestion popup when the view get the focus.
    Utilities
    Variety of helping utility functions.

Package eu.tivian.musico.utility Description

Various utility classes.
